root.name: Barrow Hill: Curse of the Ancient Circle
root.description: Archaeology meets adventure in this game set in the desolate Cornish landscape. A dig at Barrow Hill is timed with the Autumnal Equinox, but is it wise to disturb this ancient burial place during an important pagan holiday? Barrow Hill is a first-person adventure game that combines accurate archaeological exploration with adventure puzzles. The main character must uncover the mystery of Barrow Hill and learn its connection to a string of disappearances in the areaâ€¦ but doing so means facing what lies beneath the mound.
